name: Neverwinter Nights 2: Mask of the Betrayer
name_original: Neverwinter Nights 2: Mask of the Betrayer
description:
Neverwinter Nights 2: Mask of the Betrayer is a RPG game developed by Obsidian Entertainment. It was originally released in 2007. Atari published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Neverwinter Nights 2: Mask of the Betrayer on PC.
It was produced by Kevin Saunders. Alexander Brandon and Rik Schaffer scored the game.
